collections.title: Anti-Colic Bottles
collections.body_html: Designed to make feeding more comfortable for your little one. Our range of anti-colic baby bottles feature innovative venting systems that reduce air ingestion during feeding. This can help to lessen the discomfort from colic, gas, and reflux. Find a trusted solution for a calmer, happier feeding experience.

collections.title: Autumn Playdate Party Essentials
collections.body_html: Perfect party supplies and feeding gear for hosting fall playdates, featuring themed tableware, easy-clean bibs, and mess-free feeding solutions.

collections.title: Baby Bottles
collections.body_html: Discover the perfect baby bottle for your little one at Nestacular. Our curated collection features only the safest, most innovative, and ergonomically designed bottles from trusted brands. Whether you're looking for the purity of glass, the soft feel of silicone, or a specific solution to help with colic, you'll find the ideal option here. Explore our full range below or use our 'Shop by' guides to find the perfect bottle for your family.

image.alt: Assorted baby bottles in various colors and designs with matching pacifiers and cleaning brush.

collections.title: Baby Bottles & Accessories
collections.body_html: Welcome to our complete collection of baby bottles and accessories. We've curated the very best options from trusted brands, focusing on safety, ergonomic design, and a modern aesthetic. Whether you're looking for a bottle made from a specific material like glass or silicone, a solution for colic, or essential cleaning tools, you'll find it here. Explore our range to build the perfect feeding system for your family.

image.alt: Pink and blue baby bottles with measurement markings, bottle brush, and a white sterilizer.

collections.title: Baby Food Makers & Blenders
collections.body_html: Effortlessly create fresh, delicious, and nutrient-rich meals for your baby. Our range of all-in-one baby food makers can steam and blend fruits, vegetables, and more in one simple step, creating perfect purees every time. Take control of your baby's nutrition from their very first bite with these time-saving, modern kitchen essentials.

image.alt: White and green baby food maker and blender set, featuring jars and a hand blender, ideal for pureeing fruits and vegetables

collections.title: Baby Shower Gifts
collections.body_html: Give a gift that's both beautiful and incredibly useful. Our selection of baby shower gifts, from complete weaning sets to luxury tableware, are perfect for modern parents-to-be.

collections.title: Baby Shower Host Feeding Essentials
collections.body_html: Perfect gift collection for new parents featuring essential feeding items every baby shower host needs to celebrate the upcoming arrival.

collections.title: Baby Tableware
collections.body_html: Discover the complete collection of Nestacular's baby tableware. From their first spoons to toddler plates, every item is beautifully designed, non-toxic, and made to make mealtimes simpler. Shop by product, solution, material, or age to find the perfect essentials.

collections.title: Bamboo Tableware
collections.body_html: An eco-friendly choice for your family. Our bamboo tableware is made from sustainable materials, offering a lightweight and durable alternative to plastic.

collections.title: Bear Party Decorations & Birthday Supplies
collections.body_html:
Bear Party Decorations Collection

Transform your celebration with our bear-themed party decorations. This collection features everything needed for a memorable bear birthday party, from coordinated tableware to themed decorations that bring the woodland celebration to life.

Our bear party supplies include plates, cups, napkins, balloons, and decorative elements designed with adorable bear motifs. Perfect for children's birthday parties, baby showers, or any celebration where you want to create a warm, woodland atmosphere.

Each item in our bear party decorations collection is crafted with attention to detail, featuring high-quality materials and vibrant colors that coordinate seamlessly together. The bear theme appeals to all ages while creating a cohesive party aesthetic.

Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or larger celebration, these bear party decorations provide the foundation for creating lasting memories with family and friends.

collections.title: Bibs & Coveralls
collections.body_html: Contain the mess in style. Our collection of bibs ranges from wipe-clean silicone for quick meals to full-coverage coveralls for the most enthusiastic eaters.

collections.title: Booster Seats for Dining Chairs
collections.body_html: Give your toddler a seat at the big table! Our curated collection of booster seats are designed to be safe, secure, and easy to clean. They strap onto your existing dining chairs to bring your little one to the perfect height for family mealtimes.

collections.title: Bottle Accessories
collections.body_html: Find all the essential add-ons to complete your bottle-feeding system. This collection includes everything you need for a safe, hygienic, and convenient routine, from replacement teats in various flow rates to electric sterilisers, bottle warmers, and specially designed cleaning tools. Perfect your setup with these must-have accessories.

collections.title: Bottle Cleaning
collections.body_html: Keep your baby's feeding equipment hygienically clean with our range of essential cleaning tools. From specially designed bottle brushes with teat cleaners to stylish and practical drying racks, we have everything you need to wash and dry your bottles with ease. Ensure every feed is a fresh and safe one for your baby.

collections.title: Bottle Sterilisers & Warmers
collections.body_html: Save time and gain peace of mind with our collection of modern bottle sterilisers and warmers. Our electric steam sterilisers eliminate 99.9% of harmful germs, while our bottle warmers quickly and safely heat milk to the perfect temperature. Discover sleek, efficient designs that make your daily routine easier.

collections.title: Bottle Teats & Nipples
collections.body_html: As your baby grows, their feeding needs change. Find the perfect flow rate for your little one with our collection of replacement bottle teats and nipples. We offer a range of sizes, from slow-flow for newborns to faster flows for older babies, all made from soft, baby-safe silicone. Ensure your baby always has a comfortable and efficient feed.

collections.title: Bottles for Breastfed Babies
collections.body_html: Make the transition between breast and bottle seamless. This collection is specially curated for breastfed babies, featuring bottles with wide, soft, breast-like teats to encourage a natural latch and reduce the chance of nipple confusion. Perfect for parents who are combination feeding or introducing a bottle for the first time.

rules.condition: natural breast milk feeding bottle for newborns & infants.

image.alt: Four baby bottles for breastfed babies in various designs: Como Tomo (green), Dr. Brown's (clear), Lansinoh (purple), Philip

collections.title: BPA-Free Plastic Bottles
collections.body_html: Lightweight, convenient, and trusted by parents everywhere. Our collection of plastic baby bottles are all guaranteed to be 100% free of BPA, BPS, and phthalates. We've curated the most innovative and ergonomically designed bottles that offer practicality without compromising on safety for your little one.

image.alt: Clear BPA-free plastic baby bottle with white lid and measurement markings.

collections.body_html: From their first sips to confident drinking. Our collection of cups and drinkware supports every stage, including sippy cups, straw cups, and expert-recommended open cups.

collections.body_html: Designed for little hands to hold. Our ergonomic baby and toddler cutlery helps develop self-feeding skills with easy-grip handles and safe, effective designs.

collections.body_html: Portable, labeled feeding supplies perfect for daycare and childcare - bottles, warmers, bibs, and travel-friendly feeding tools.

collections.body_html: For their very first tastes of solid food. This collection includes soft-tip spoons, small suction bowls, and easy-clean bibs perfect for the puree stage.

Our collection of food storage containers are made from safe, non-toxic materials like glass and silicone, with airtight and leak-proof lids to preserve nutrients and flavour. Perfect for storing portions in the fridge or packing in a diaper bag for days out.

collections.body_html: Find the perfect present for a new parent or baby. Our curated collection of beautiful and practical gifts and sets are sure to be loved and used every day, from baby showers to first birthdays.

collections.title: Glass Baby Bottles
collections.body_html: Discover the pure and sustainable choice for your baby's feeding journey. Our curated collection of glass baby bottles are crafted from thermal-shock resistant borosilicate glass, ensuring they are safe, durable, and easy to clean. Free from the chemicals sometimes found in plastic, glass offers ultimate peace of mind. Shop our range of ergonomic and stylish glass bottles from leading brands.

collections.body_html: Get everything you need to start your bottle-feeding journey with confidence. collections.body_html: Make eating out simple and stylish. Our on-the-go collection includes portable bibs, travel cutlery sets, and insulated jars for warm meals anywhere.

collections.body_html: Serve up delicious meals in our beautiful and practical baby plates and bowls. Designed for little ones, with features like suction bases and divided sections.

collections.body_html: Extend the life of your favourite high chair with our official replacement trays and straps. Find the exact parts you need to keep your chair safe, clean, and functional for years to come.

collections.title: Restaurant Baby Chairs - Commercial High Chairs
collections.body_html:
Restaurant Baby Chairs for Commercial Dining

Professional-grade baby chairs designed specifically for restaurant and commercial dining environments. These commercial high chairs feature durable construction, easy-to-clean surfaces, and safety features that meet commercial foodservice standards.

Restaurant baby chairs must withstand frequent daily use while maintaining safety and hygiene standards. Our collection includes stackable designs for efficient storage, non-porous materials that resist stains and bacteria, and sturdy frames built to handle the demands of busy dining establishments.

Key features include adjustable safety straps, removable trays for easy cleaning, and stable bases that prevent tipping. These commercial-grade baby chairs help restaurants provide safe, comfortable seating for their youngest guests while streamlining cleanup and storage operations.

collections.title: Returning to Work Mom Feeding Prep
collections.body_html: Essential feeding gear for moms transitioning back to work after maternity leave, featuring portable warmers, training cups, and easy-clean essentials.

collections.title: Reusable Food Pouches
collections.body_html: Take healthy, homemade meals on the go without the waste. Our reusable food pouches are an eco-friendly and cost-effective alternative to single-use shop-bought pouches. Featuring wide, easy-fill openings and leak-proof seals, they are perfect for purees, smoothies, and yoghurts for mess-free snacking anywhere, anytime.

collections.title: Silicone Baby Bottles
collections.body_html: Soft, safe, and designed to mimic the natural feel of breastfeeding. Our collection of silicone baby bottles are made from 100% food-grade silicone, making them lightweight, unbreakable, and a perfect choice for tiny hands to hold. Their flexible nature makes them easy to clean and comfortable for your baby. Explore our range of aesthetic and ergonomic silicone bottles.

collections.title: Silicone Freezer Trays
collections.body_html: The secret to efficient meal prep is batch-cooking. Our silicone freezer trays allow you to freeze perfect, single-serving portions of homemade purees and baby food. The flexible, non-stick silicone makes it effortless to pop out a single cube for mealtime, and the included lids prevent freezer burn and contamination.

collections.title: Silicone Tableware
collections.body_html: Durable, unbreakable, and beautifully minimalist. Our complete range of 100% food-grade silicone tableware is the safe and stylish choice for modern parents.

collections.title: Snack Pots
collections.body_html: For healthy snacks at home or on the go. Our clever snack pots are designed for little hands to easily access their food while preventing major spills.

collections.title: Space Saving Chairs - Compact Folding & Stackable
collections.body_html:
Space Saving Chairs for Small Spaces

Transform your compact living space with our collection of space saving chairs designed for modern homes and apartments. These chairs maximize functionality while minimizing footprint through innovative folding mechanisms, stackable designs, and compact profiles.

Folding Chairs for Easy Storage

Our folding space saving chairs collapse flat for convenient storage in closets, under beds, or behind doors. Perfect for occasional seating that doesn't compromise on comfort or style.

Stackable Chair Solutions

Stackable designs allow multiple chairs to nest together, reducing storage space by up to 80%. Ideal for dining rooms, home offices, and multi-purpose spaces where flexibility matters.

Compact Chair Designs

Each space saving chair features a streamlined profile that fits seamlessly into tight corners, small dining areas, and studio apartments without overwhelming the space.

Whether you need extra seating for guests or daily-use chairs that disappear when not needed, our space saving chair collection offers practical solutions for any compact living situation.

collections.title: Stainless Steel Bottles
collections.body_html: The ultimate choice for durability and longevity. Our stainless steel baby bottles are completely plastic-free, shatterproof, and built to last from the newborn stage to toddlerhood and beyond. Many of our models are also insulated, keeping milk warm for longer when you're on the go. Shop our range of hygienic and eco-friendly stainless steel bottles.

collections.title: Stainless Steel Tableware
collections.body_html: Hygienic, durable, and completely plastic-free. Our stainless steel tableware is built to last a lifetime, perfect for toddlers and beyond.

collections.title: Suction Tableware
collections.body_html: No more flying plates! Our powerful suction tableware is designed to stay firmly put on high chair trays and tables, making mealtimes less messy and more fun.

collections.body_html: Essential portable feeding gear for toddlers during holiday family gatherings, making mealtime manageable away from home.
